strategy: Traitor Titan armies have a Strategy Rating of 3.
Initiative: Traitor Titan formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+, all other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Traitor Titans of the Dark Mechancius

Except for the Battle Titan formations, Titans are listed as Titan Chassis and an ammount of Weapons that could be added. Example a Reaver is listed as 3 Battle Titan weapons. You must add 3 Battle Titan weapons from the list weapons below.

sections.name: Chaos Allegiance
sections.description: Choose one of the following Allegiances and apply the bonus to your army. If you take a Chaos Cult Titan, it must be alligned to your chaos allegiance. Additionall all lesser daemons shall be from this allegiance.

formations.name: Undivided
formations.units: All Titan formatioins gain +1 inititive. This Applies to Chaos Warlord Titans, Chaos Reaver Titans and Chaos Scout Titan formations.

formations.name: Slaanesh
extraUnits: All Chaos Warlord Titans gain EA(+3) 'First Stike' attacks in Base Contact
All Chaos Reaver Titans gain EA(+2) 'First Stike' attacks in Base Contact
All Chaos Scout Titans gain EA(+1) 'First Stike' attacks in Base Contact

formations.name: Khorne
extraUnits: All Chaos Warlord Titans gain EA(+3), MW attacks in Base Contact
All Chaos Reaver Titans gain EA(+2), MW attacks in Base Contact
All Chaos Scout Titans gain EA(+1), MW attacks in Base Contact

formations.name: Tzeentch
extraUnits: All Chaos Warlord Titans gain EA(+3), MW attacks in Fire Fight
All Chaos Reaver Titans gain EA(+2), MW attacks in Fire Fight
All Chaos Scout Titans gain EA(+1), MW attacks in Fire Fight

formations.name: Nurgle
extraUnits: All Chaos Warlord Titans gain Ignore Cover in Fire Fight
All Chaos Reaver Titans gain Ignore Cover in Fire Fight
All Chaos Scout Titans gain Ignore Cover in Fire Fight

formations.name: 0-1 Cult Titan
formations.units: One of the following Titans, no Chaos Warlord Titans may be taken with one of these.

formations.name: Chaos Warlord Titan
formations.units: One Chaos Warlord Titan. 4 Weapons from the Battle Titan Weapon list may be taken. Max 2 Arm Weapons and 2 Carapace weapons. Weapons listed as just 'Weapon' maybe count as either.

formations.name: Chaos Reaver Titan
formations.units: One Chaos Reaver Titan. 3 Weapons from the Battle Titan Weapon list may be taken. Max 2 Arm Weapons and 2 Carapace weapons. Weapons listed as just 'Weapon' maybe count as either.

sections.name: Scout Titan Formations
sections.description: Up to two Scout Titan formations for each Battle Titan formation

formations.name: Chaos Warhound
formations.units: One Chaos Warhound Titan. 2 Weapons from the Scout Titan Weapon list may be taken.

sections.name: Dark Mechancius Support Formations
sections.description: Up to 1/3 of the points available may be spent on Adeptus Mechanicus Allies.

formations.name: Defiler Pack
upgrades: Add up to two Defilers for 50 points each

sections.name: Chaos Navy
sections.description: Up to 1/3 of the points available may be spent on Adeptus Mechanicus Allies.

upgrades.title: Titan Legion Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

options.description: Add one Legate to the formation
Add one Veteran Princeps to the formation
Add Carapace Multilaser to the Titan.

items.name: Daemonic Pact
items.description: Add Daemonic Pact to the formation, and one point to the Lesser Daemon Pool

items.name: Dreadnoughts
items.description: Add two Chaos Dreadnoughts to the formation

items.name: Daemon Pool
items.description: Add Minor Daemons to a Daemon pool.
